data.comment: The match is underway at Serra Dourada.
Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 1, Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira awards the home team a throw-in.
In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Cleber Bomfim (Ceara) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 3, Ceara have been awarded a corner by Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira.
Goianiense GO have a goal kick.
Can Goianiense GO capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ceara's half?
In the minute 4, Ceara's Vinicius Goes gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Goianiense GO goal kick.
Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goianiense GO's half?
In the minute 5, Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
The match at Serra Dourada has been interrupted briefly for a check on Hyuri, who is down injured.
Throw-in for Ceara at Serra Dourada.
In the minute 7, Goianiense GO's Hyuri is back in action after a slight knock.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Ceara close to the penalty box.
Ceara drive upfield and Vinicius Goes gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Goianiense GO defender.
In the minute 9, Ceara's Cleber Bomfim is whistled for offside at Serra Dourada.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Ceara.
Ball safe as Goianiense GO is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 11, Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a Ceara throw-in in Goianiense GO's half.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
Goianiense GO's Gustavo Ferrareis is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 12, Everton Felipe for Goianiense GO gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira awards Ceara a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
In the minute 15, Important block from the Goianiense GO defence as Leandro Carvalho fires in a strike for Ceara.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Goiania to check on Jorginho, who is grimacing with pain.
Jorginho for Goianiense GO is back on the field again.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Ceara in the half of Goianiense GO.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 19, Ceara to take a throw-in in Goianiense GO territory.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira waits before resuming play because Leandro Carvalho for Ceara is still down.
Leandro Carvalho is back on the pitch.
In the minute 22, Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Ceara.
Free kick Ceara.
In the minute 24, Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a throw-in for Ceara, close to Goianiense GO's area.
Goianiense GO's Gustavo Ferrareis breaks free at Serra Dourada. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Goiania.
In the minute 26, Ceara have been awarded a corner by Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 27, Throw-in Goianiense GO.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO at Serra Dourada.
In the minute 30, Goianiense GO awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO close to the penalty box.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 32, Ball safe as Goianiense GO is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira awards the home team a throw-in.
In Goiania Goianiense GO attack through Everton Felipe. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 32, Goal kick for Ceara at Serra Dourada.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Ceara needs to be cautious. Goianiense GO have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 35, In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goianiense GO drives forward and Jean gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
In the minute 37, Throw-in high up the field for Goianiense GO in Goiania.
Throw-in for Ceara in their own half.
Ceara's Fabinho gets in a shot on goal at Serra Dourada. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 39, Goianiense GO have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
Gustavo Ferrareis for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Goianiense GO.
Throw-in Goianiense GO.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in the half of Ceara.
In the minute 42, Ceara surge into the attack at Serra Dourada but Cleber Bomfim’s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Goianiense GO at Serra Dourada.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Cleber Bomfim.
In the minute 44, Ceara's Cleber Bomfim looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Can Goianiense GO get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
Ceara have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a throw-in for Goianiense GO, close to Ceara's area.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Ceara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Goianiense GO awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a Goianiense GO throw-in in Ceara's half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Goiania.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Goianiense GO's Edson gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira awards Ceara a goal kick.
In the minute 48, Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO at Serra Dourada.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 50, Goianiense GO's Marlon Freitas goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Goianiense GO.
In the minute 53, Ball goes out of play for a Goianiense GO goal kick.
Marlon Freitas of Goianiense GO smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Ceara needs to be cautious. Goianiense GO have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 55, Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Goiania.
Ball safe as Ceara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 56, Ceara to take a throw-in in Goianiense GO territory.
Ceara have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Ceara close to the penalty box.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Ceara at Serra Dourada.
Goal kick for Ceara at Serra Dourada.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 60, Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goianiense GO's half?
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira awards the home team a throw-in.
In Goiania, Cleber Bomfim (Ceara) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 61, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Jean for Goianiense GO who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Jean is back on his feet again.
In the minute 62, Corner awarded to Ceara.
Vagner Mancini is making the team's first substitution at Serra Dourada with Janderson Santos de Souza replacing Everton Felipe.
Ball safe as Goianiense GO is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira.
In the minute 64, Goal! Vinicius Goes gives Ceara a 0-1 lead.
Fernando Sobral with an assist there.
Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 67, Goianiense GO are pushing forward but Janderson Santos de Souza's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Ceara goal kick.
Throw-in Goianiense GO.
In the minute 68, Goianiense GO's Jorginho breaks free at Serra Dourada. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ceara have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Goianiense GO.
In the minute 71, Fernando Sobral for Ceara is whistled offside.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 72, The home team replace Hyuri with Chico.
Goianiense GO make their third substitution with Matheus Frizzo replacing Jorginho.
Goianiense GO apply pressure at Serra Dourada and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Chico but the strike hits the bar!
In the minute 73, Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira awards Ceara a goal kick.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO at Serra Dourada.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a Goianiense GO throw-in in Ceara's half.
In the minute 74, In Goiania Goianiense GO drive forward through Marlon Freitas. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick in a good position for Ceara!
He's off! Marlon Freitas is shown a red card.
In the minute 78, Ceara push upfield and Gabriel Lacerda gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Goianiense GO defence.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Guto Ferreira (Ceara) is making a first substitution, with Manucho replacing Leandro Carvalho.
In the minute 79, Can Goianiense GO capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ceara's half?
Attention is being given to Ceara’s Samuel Xavier and play has been suspended briefly.
Ceara’s Samuel Xavier is on his feet again at Serra Dourada.
In the minute 81, Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Ceara.
Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goianiense GO's half?
Vinicius Lima is replacing Vinicius Goes for Ceara at Serra Dourada.
In the minute 83, Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
Goianiense GO to take a throw-in in Ceara territory.
Ceara have a goal kick.
In the minute 85, Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Goiania.
Free kick Goianiense GO.
In the minute 86, Tiago is booked for the away team.
The home team have replaced Gustavo Ferrareis with Matheus Vargas. This is the fourth substitution made today by Vagner Mancini.
Joao Victor is on a sub for Dudu for Goianiense GO.
In the minute 89, Nicolas Vichiatto (Goianiense GO) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in high up the field for Goianiense GO in Goiania.
Manucho (Ceara) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Ceara in the half of Goianiense GO.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira awards the away team a throw-in.
Fernando Sobral (Ceara) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Ceara.
Throw-in for Ceara in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Chico (Goianiense GO) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira.
Goianiense GO drive upfield and Nicolas Vichiatto gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Ceara defender.
In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-2.
Vinicius Lima (Ceara) has received a first yellow card.
Rafael Sobis is replacing Cleber Bomfim for the away team.
Matheus Frizzo for Goianiense GO has been booked by Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira and receives a first yellow card.
Goal! Ceara extend their lead to 0-2 through Vinicius Lima.
